title: Resort Style Pool with Sundeck, Close to Shopping, Pantry
posting_body: ['$500 Off Your First Full Month!', 'Schedule a Tour Today: <URL>', 'At Eclipse, our residents will find the perfect place to call home.', 'With amazing amenities in each home and throughout our stunning community, our luxury apartments in Duluth, GA will accommodate every lifestyle.', 'Within our one bedroom and two bedroom homes, residents will find stainless steel appliances, full-sized washers and dryers, and wood-burning fireplaces that will provide an unmatched sense of comfort and convenience.', 'Throughout our community, the resort-style swimming pool and outdoor lounge area, fitness center, and modern clubroom will offer the perfect backdrop for every occasion.', 'Amenities:', '-Breakfast Bar', '-Granite Style Counters', '-Close to Shopping', '-Online Payments Available', '-Laundry Room with Washer & Dryer in every apartment', '-Custom Cabinetry', '-Pantry', '-Onsite Maintenance Staff', '-Fire Pit', '-Fireplace', '-Open Floor Plans', '-Resort Style Pool with Sundeck', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
